original_text: The cart came to the field of Joshua of Beth Shemesh, and there it stopped beside a large rock. The people chopped up the wood of the cart and sacrificed the cows as a burnt offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 수레가 벧세메스 사람 여호수아의 밭 큰 돌 있는 곳에 이르러 선지라 무리가 수레의 나무를 패고 그 암소들을 번제물로 여호와께 드리고

sentences.original_text: The cart came to the field of Joshua of Beth Shemesh
and there it stopped beside a large rock
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 큰 바위 곁에 멈춰 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: The people chopped up the wood of the cart
and sacrificed the cows as a burnt offering to the Lord
